CustomField.description: JSON configuration that defines which fields to display, their labels, section/block titles, and formatting types (phone, email, currency, date, boolean, number). The JSON structure determines the rendering order in the Review Summary component.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter valid JSON. Use _sectionTitle for section headers, _blockTitle for block headers. For explicit formatting, use object syntax: { "label": "Label", "type": "phone" }
CustomField.label: Label JSON
